options.title: -B
options.description: Raw, non-interactive mode. The default is to exit after two screen updates, with statistics only ever displayed once. Useful for views such as cpu, where initial calculations are useless.

options.title: -b
options.description: Raw, non-interactive mode. The default is to exit after one screen update, with statistics displayed every update.

options.title: -N
options.description: Resolve network addresses to names. This is the opposite of the -n option.

options.title: -n
options.description: Do not try to reverse map IP addresses. This is the default.

options.title: -s delay
options.description: Specifies the screen refresh time interval in seconds. This option is overridden by the final delay argument, if given. The default interval is 5 seconds.

options.title: -w width
options.description: Specifies the maximum width of the output in raw, non-interactive mode.
